caption.p: Cartoon representation of the protein-ligand interactions of the phytochemical inhibitors of cathepsin L. Interactions of cathepsin L residues with atoms of ( a) C1, ( b) C2, ( c) C3, ( d) C4, ( e) C5, and ( f) C6. The carbon atoms of the ligand are shown in green colour while the carbon atoms of the amino acid residues in cathepsin L are shown in cyan colour. Cathepsin L residues interacting with the ligand atoms via hydrogen bonds or π-π stacking are labelled with the corresponding single letter residue code along with their position in the protein sequence. The hydrogen bonds and π-π stacking are displayed using yellow and red dotted lines, respectively.
